channel.title: Help!
channel.description: Need someone help me make my runescape private server online and port forward my router i have a perfect server all skills working everything is working no gliches like real rs 2011 but need someone make it online cause i dont know how to make it online and who will make my server if he got a visa or something i will let him make a donation system to his own bank cause i really dont need money and soon i will get a visa and i will buy vps 24/7 alot of ppl waiting to join need someone just help me My Skype is ilan.kawas

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The help section is here for us to provide you with help. Sadly, for you, it is not here for us to do everything for you.

If you would like to recruit someone to join your development team (so they can work with you), post a topic here. You can also join an existing development team there too.

Don’t forget to read the rules before posting

twobrosplay:

(Note you have to jar your client for it to work anywere)

Incorrect. You do not need to jar a client for it to work properly. It is safer for you as a developer to only give out the jar file (Note that they can be decompiled) instead of the .class files. It will also give you more players (The average user doesn’t know how to create a command line script to run compiled java files). And you do not want to give out the .java files as they are the source files and people can do malicious things with those.

Protip: the BBC code for urls is [url ]. (no space)

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @twobrosplay twobrosplay
item.description:
@twobrosplay wrote:

Hmm I haven’t reached the point of vps hosting

But I beleave you can make or get a donation system using the (donate button on paypal)

First more what server type is it?

Also I haven’t tryed any of them myself but here’s some tutorials
(Note you have to jar your client for it to work anywere)

[Link] http://www.google.com/url?q=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/309503-running-rsps-centos-linux.html&sa=U&ei=gERkVN3uH9XVapmKgtgN&ved=0CBEQFjAA&usg=AFQjCNEbR2OE05qbG84kAiFImhPfbdw4oQ [/link]
